title: Add input validation to user form
description:
The user registration form currently accepts any input.
Add validation for:
- Email format
- Password strength (min 8 chars)
- Required fields

title: Update README with new API endpoints
description:
Document the following new API endpoints in README.md:
- POST /api/users - Create user
- GET /api/users/:id - Get user by ID
- PUT /api/users/:id - Update user

title: Add form submission API integration
description:
After form validation is complete (tc-001), integrate with the backend API.
- Submit form data to POST /api/users
- Handle success/error responses
- Display appropriate messages

title: Refactor database connection pooling
description:
Current database connections are created per-request.
Implement connection pooling for better performance.
